name: M5 Bravo Anatomy Sketch set!
description:
I recently did a series of anatomy based drawings for an upcoming project, they were really a lot of fun to draw!  Now I'm offering the original art for this series. Both pieces are on  8 1/2 x 11 paper. The pencil art is on lined graph paper, the inked art is on heavy cardstock. Both are signed by me (not pictured in the photos).

Shipped rolled in a sturdy tube within ten days after sale.

name: Greasebat Battle Scene with Mecha Greasebat & more
description:
This is the line art for a promo piece related to an upcoming solo art show. Also included, the original pencil sketch! Both signed and dated 2013.  Both are on cardstock paper, which is heavier than what I've been using lately. Features Greasebat, Spike Wad, Mecha Greasebat and a new figure- Battle Damaged M 5 Bravo!

Inked art is done with archival ink. Both pieces are 8.5 x 11 inches, shipped rolled in a sturdy tube. Pencil sketch sorta half pictured on my messy drawing table, it looks the same as the inked art, only in pencil.

Thanks for lookin' !

name: Greasebat & Kids
description:
Retro style illustration I used for a fake cereal box. Featuring Greasebat and two happy kids chowing down on an imaginary bowl of sugary goodness. 

Ink on cardstock paper, sized 8 1/2 x 11 inches (21 x 27 cm) .

All artwork are original, one of a kind pieces. Drawn and signed by me, Jeff Lamm. All are pieces used in actual production of things like header card art, sticker art, advertising art, gig posters...some even went on to appear as high fashion designs! Paper may have folds, bent corners, pencil marks, smudge marks etc. Anything major will be noted in the description.


All items will be shipped rolled in a sturdy tube, within ten days of receiving & completing payment. Thanks for taking a look!
